title: How do I analyze myself while re-watching my games?
body:
Everybody says that the quickest way to get better is by re-watching my games.

Okay, so I'm doing that. However, I don't necessarily know what to do when re-watching them. Does anybody have any tips on what I should be looking for/analyzing? Or could you post some videos of how to analyze my games?

Thanks!
p.s. I was PlatV last season if that makes any difference.
